getCandidates

public java.util.List<ViterbiCandidate> getCandidates(Target target)
Preselect a set of candidates that could be used to realise the given target.

Parameters:
target - a Target object representing an optimal unit
Returns:
an unsorted ArrayList of ViterbiCandidates, each containing the (same) target and a (different) Unit object

getFilenameAndTime

public java.lang.String getFilenameAndTime(Unit unit)
For debugging, return the basename of the original audio file from which the unit is coming, as well as the start time in that file.

Parameters:
unit -
Returns:
a String containing basename followed by a space and the unit's start time, in seconds, from the beginning of the file. If no basenameTimeline was specified for this voice, returns the string "unknown origin".

getFilename

public java.lang.String getFilename(Unit unit)
For debugging, return the basename of the original audio file from which the unit is coming.

Parameters:
unit -
Returns:
a String containing basename. If no basenameTimeline was specified for this voice, returns the string "unknown origin".
